plays.text: Goal scored by Ryan Malone assisted by Eric Boguniecki AND John LeClair

Penalty to Sergei Gonchar 2 minutes for High Sticking Andrej Meszaros

Penalty to Andre Roy 2 minutes for Roughing Vaclav Varada
Goal scored by Peter Schaefer assisted by Chris Neil AND Bryan Smolinski
Goal scored by Eric Boguniecki assisted by Ryan Malone AND Josef Melichar
Penalty to Andre Roy 2 minutes for Unsportsmanlike Conduct(opposing player not identified)

Goal scored by Peter Schaefer unassisted
Penalty to Eric Boguniecki 2 minutes for Tripping Patrick Eaves
